trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a metadata document returned from a metadata exchange endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en referanse til en Metadatadokumentet returnert fra en exchange-endepunktet for metadata.

trans-unit.source: When using [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], a metadata endpoint can be created for any service.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], et metadata-sluttpunkt kan opprettes for alle tjenestene.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint can be queried for metadata that allows a client to communicate with the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet kan spørre for metadata som tillater at klienten kommuniserer med sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: For example, a metadata endpoint can return a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document that describes the methods and data types of a service.
trans-unit.target: Et sluttpunkt for metadata kan for eksempel returnere et Web Services beskrivelse språket (WSDL)-dokument som beskriver metodene og datatypene for en tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataReference class is used with WS-MetadataExchange responses where references are directly encoded as `<mex:MetadataReference>` or `<mex:MetadataLocation``>`.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MetadataReference brukes med WS MetadataExchange svar der refererer direkte kodet som `<mex:MetadataReference>` eller `<mex:MetadataLocation``>`.

trans-unit.source: Metadata documents can reference many other documents that describe types and those documents can contain even more references.
trans-unit.target: Metadata dokumenter kan referere til mange andre dokumenter som beskriver typer og disse dokumentene kan inneholde ytterligere referanser.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataReference class represents a single endpoint that returns a document that can itself contain multiple WSDL or XSD items as well as other metadata references to other WS-MetadataExchange endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MetadataReference representerer et enkelt endepunkt som returnerer et dokument som kan selv inneholde flere WSDL eller XSD-elementer i tillegg til andre metadatareferanser til andre WS MetadataExchange endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the MetadataReference class are commonly used when processing a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>, which represents the total metadata exchange point.
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av klassen MetadataReference brukes vanligvis under behandling av en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>, som representerer exchange punktet totalt metadata.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver> class is designed to resolve all references used to return the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver>klassen er utformet for å løse alle referanser til å returnere metadataene.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataResolver>

trans-unit.source: If, however, you need to examine each reference, use the MetadataReference class to represent each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du imidlertid å undersøke hver referanse, bruker du MetadataReference klassen til å representere hvert endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Specifications [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] implements the Web Services Metadata Exchange (WS-MetadataExchange) specification for returning metadata.
trans-unit.target: Spesifikasjonene [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] implementerer spesifikasjonen Web Services Metadata Exchange (WS-MetadataExchange) for å returnere metadata.

trans-unit.source: That specification further uses the Web Services Transfer (WS-Transfer) specification to define the mechanism for retrieving XML-based data.
trans-unit.target: Som bruker spesifikasjonen mer spesifikasjonen Web Services overføre (WS Transfer) til å definere mekanisme for henting av XML-baserte data.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference"></xref> class and specifies the network address and address version of the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataReference"> </xref> klasse og angir nettverksadresse og adresseversjon av endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that contains the URI of the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>som inneholder URIEN for endepunktet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> that contains the WS-Addressing version implemented by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion>som inneholder den WS-adressering versjonen implementeres av endepunktet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the network address of a service that returns metadata.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nettverksadresse for en tjeneste som returnerer metadata.

trans-unit.source: An endpoint that returns metadata.
trans-unit.target: Et endepunkt som returnerer metadata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version implemented in, or used by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir versjon implementert i eller brukes av endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion> that represents the version implemented in, or used by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion>som representerer versjon implementert i eller brukes av endepunktet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AddressingVersion>

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML schema document for the metadata reference endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en XML-skjemadokument for metadata referanse sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that represents the XML Schema Document (XSD) for the metadata endpoint reference.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>som representerer XML-skjema dokumentet (XSD) for metadata endpoint referansen.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Reads using the supplied reader object.
trans-unit.target: Leser ved hjelp av den angitte Leserobjekt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> used to read with.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>brukes til å lese med.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Writes an XML stream with the specified writer object.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en XML-strømmen med det angitte writer-objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> used to write with.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>brukes til å skrive med.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>
